# Intake Engine Boundary (Phase 23)

This module governs belief and justification intake.

Responsibilities:
- Validation
- Admissibility checks
- Invariant pre-check coordination
- Controller-mediated admission

Prohibitions:
- No belief modification
- No tension creation
- No revision execution
- No LLM-based judgment

Canon: Phase 23 (Frozen, v0.1)
